0.1.name: wordpress/news-tick-o-matic
0.1.description: jQuery animated WordPress widget that displays the newest of news in a a silky smooth scrolling news ticker in the sidebar. Full documentation is available to delight and inform. Need help? Check out the excellent, free community support here on WordPress. Need a heaping' helping' of help? Premium support is available for at crazy low rates.
